description: Pair the natural numbers such that the m-th pair is (r, s) where r, s and s-r are the smallest numbers which have not occurred earlier and also are not equal to the difference of any earlier pair: (1, 3), (4, 9), (6, 13), (8, 18), (11, 23), (14, 29), (16, 33), (19, 39), (21, 43), (24, 49), (26, 53), (28, 58), ... Sequence gives first term of each pair.
